instructions: On your Android phone or tablet, open your device's Settings app and then Google and then Google Account Management . At the top, tap Security . Under "Signing in to Google," tap 2-Step Verification . You might need to sign in. Under "Set up alternative second step," find "Authenticator app" and tap Set up . Follow the steps on the screen. To verify it's working, get a code from your Authenticator app. Enter it in your settings.
